ema sakaya krikat kridawata aadaraya karannan athara pamanak nowa madhyawedin atharada katha bahata lak wima hethuwen tharagayen pasu pawathi madhya hamuwedi ehi sathya asathyathawa pilibanda madhyawedihu sangakkaragen wimasa sitiyaha.krida lolinge sakaya duru karamin kumar sangakkara kiya sitiye thama sidu kala aacharaye kisidu wisheshathwayak nathi bawayi.thama mithuru mahela samanga krida karana awasan test inima sandaha pitiye randi sitiyadi athi wu hangima sambandhayenda madhyawedihu sangakkaragen wimasa sitiyaha.mahelage thanamahela jayawardhana test kridawen samu ganimath samangama krikat kridawa sambandhayen unanduwak dakwana siyalu denage katha bahata lak wi aththe shri lanka kandayame pithikaru layisthuwe athi wana purappaduwa pilibandawayi.ee anuwa kandayama thula mahelage hidasa pirawiya haki weda yanna pilibanda athamun saka pahala karayi.ee sambandhayen shri lanka supiri kridaka kumar sangakkara madhyayata adahas dakwamin pawasuwe test kandayamata athulu wana nawaka kridakayata mahela jayawardhana wani wishishta kridakayaku wannata awashya athdakim laba ganimata kalaya laba diya yuthu bawayi.

ikuth mayi masa 11 wani dina birinda wideshagathawu bawath me wana thek ayata kisidu watupak pawa gewa nomathi bawath, kisidu aarakshawak pawa nomathiwa sitina bawath, rakiya eejansikaru thama birindage durakathana ankayata katha kara swamipurushayage katayuthu nathara nokalahoth athurudan karana bawata tharjanaya kara athi bawath ohu kiya siti.
